cities.name: Sydney, Australia
cities.description: A vibrant city know for its iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House

cities.name: Berlin, Germany
cities.description: Berlin is the capital of Germany and a vibrant city known for its rich history, culture, and nightlife.

cities.name: Tokyo, Japan
cities.description: A bustling city that blends traditional temples with futuristic skyscrapers.

cities.name: New York, USA
cities.description: The city that never sleeps, famous for Times Square and Central Park.

cities.name: Copacabana, Brasil
cities.description: Copacabana has a crescent-shaped beach and is a nicknamed Princess of the sea

cities.name: Cancun, Mexico
cities.description: Located on the Yucatan Peninsula bordering the Caribbean Sea, it is known for its beaches, numerous resorts and nightlife.
